name: Nonverbal Communication
description: The basics of nonverbal communication, including gestures, facial expressions, and body language.

name: Eye Contact
description: Understanding the importance of eye contact in communication and social interaction.

name: Symbol-Based Communication
description: Using symbols and visual aids to communicate effectively when verbal communication is challenging.

name: Emotional Expression
description: Recognizing and expressing emotions through facial expressions, tone, and body language.

name: Social Cues
description: Understanding and responding to social cues in conversation and interaction.

name: Adaptive Communication
description: Techniques for adapting communication strategies based on context and audience.

name: Assistive Technology
description: Overview of assistive technology tools and apps that can aid communication.

name: Voice Modulation
description: Techniques for controlling and adapting voice tone, pitch, and speed for effective communication.

name: Communication Barriers
description: Understanding and overcoming common barriers to effective communication.

name: Digital Communication
description: Using digital tools and platforms for enhanced communication capabilities.
